answers.answer: Maybe go have a lay down if you can between the other 4! Sounds like u just wore urself out a bit. Having 10lbs does put u at risk of spd- my family have noth spd and 10lbs so ive been warned about  both. If you don't get any relief from some paracetamol and a laydown, go back to the doc.

question: After a very long night not being able to sleep to uncomfortable,  I had a growth scan and consultant appt this morning. My baby is estimated to weigh 7lb 8 oz at 36 week's. I do have big 10lb+ babies so not a shock.  My appt turned into a totally nightmare,  had to spend the day having tests ect to see if I had pre eclampsia or diabetes, whilst I'm already feeling like poo. After I was released wiv a clean bill of health on the walk back to the car I had to stop and let out a little cry 'ouch!'  Lots of pain ,lighting ,pelvis pain and wot also felt like a major contraction . been uncomfortable ever since backache VERY achy lady parts! Every time I stand or walk it starts and is very painful. Wot do u think ladies?? Is it my body just had enough today?  I feel very stupid as this is baby number 5! But never experienced this iv always has easy pregnancies and spontaneous labour's.
title: spd or braxton hicks. Help tired and emotional :(
